CustomField.description: This field is used to display Serial Number from associated Installed Product/Stocked Serial.
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( SM_Installed_Product__c )) , SM_Installed_Product__r.Serial_Lot_Number__c , IF( NOT(ISBLANK( SM_Stocked_Serial__c )) , SM_Stocked_Serial__r.Name , '') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to display Serial Number from associated Installed Product/Stocked Serial.
CustomField.label: Serial Number
